cause.description:
the message that this group sends 2 all Palestinian gun men is to stop this frivolous attacks on each other & start 2 solve this situation in peaceful ways... Your just killing more Palestinians than you are killing each other, & look at the world around you, they see you as kids who didn't pass their 2 year & start to think... Israel didn't dare to do to you what you are doing to each other, now you want to prove to them that they were right in starting a war against you?... & why so much that you want to rule Gaza Hamas?, so that you can destroy the dream of istablishing the Palestinian country & keep on fighting? In other words, let's be hand-in-hand & show the world that we deserve to live as they do & enjoy what's left in our lives...
1. Hamas & Fatah has to stop now!!!
cause.mission: send a message 2 the gun men 2 stop right now!!!
cause.name: Stop The Bloodshed In Gaza Immediately!!!
